volcano.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava (=very hot liquid rock) is sometimes forced out
volcano.translation[0].definitions[0].no: extinct volcano (=one that is no longer active at all)
volcano.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Pompei was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
volcano.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: The volcano last erupted 50 years ago.
Mount Etna is still an active volcano.
Volcanoes can remain dormant for hundreds of years.
The lake is at the foot of an extinct volcano.
